analysis.description:
RuletkaIo.enterWithReferral (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#95-116) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- referrer.transfer(referrerCut) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#104)

RuletkaIo.executeRoom (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#116-135) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- CTO.transfer(halfFee) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#126-127)
	- CEO.transfer(halfFee) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#128)

RuletkaIo._payout (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#203-218) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- CTO.transfer(SafeMath.div(address(this).balance,2)) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#212-213)
	- CEO.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#214)
	- _to.transfer(address(this).balance) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#214-216)
players in RuletkaIo.createRoom (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#68-69) is a local variable never initialiazed

RuletkaIo.distributeFunds has external calls inside a loop:
	- room.players[i].transfer(balanceToDistribute) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#145-148)

RuletkaIo.refundPlayersInRoom has external calls inside a loop:
	- room.players[i].transfer(balanceToRefund) (/unique_chucks/7/0xef02c45c5913629dd12e7a9446455049775eec32.sol#167-170)
